alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:10AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gosper, western Dawson and Furnas Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1209 AM CDT, automated weather stations reported strong gusts associated with weakening showers and thunerstorms along a line extending from near Brady to near Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area to near Herndon. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar and Automated Weather Stations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cozad, Gothenburg, Cambridge, Arapahoe, Elwood, Beaver City, Holbrook, Edison, Wilsonville, Smithfield, Hendley, Willow Island, Johnson Lake and Farnam. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 234. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
